```{r}
setwd("/Users/pavan/Desktop/Git/6101 project/DS-6101-Final")
music = data.frame(read.csv("music_genre.csv"))
str(music)
```

```{r}
# drop those blank genre values 
music = music[!(music$music_genre == ""),]

```



Prepossessing the Genre Column with dummy variables
```{r}

#genres<-c("Electronic","Anime","Jazz","Alternative","Country","Rap","Blues","Rock","Classical","Hip-Hop")
new_genres<-c()
for (i in music$music_genre) 
  {
  if (i=="Electronic")
    new_genres<-append(new_genres,values=1)
  else
    new_genres<-append(new_genres,values=0)
}
music$new_genres<-new_genres

music$new_genres = factor(music$new_genres)

str(music)
```


```{r, results = 'markup'}
loadPkg("rpart")

set.seed(1)
treefit <- rpart(new_genres ~ liveness + loudness + mode, data=music, method="class", control = list(maxdepth = 15) )
summary(treefit)
plot(treefit, uniform=TRUE, main="Classification Tree")

loadPkg("rattle")
fancyRpartPlot(treefit)


```
